headline: Qualys (QLYS) Q4 Earnings and Revenues Surpass Estimates
summary: Qualys (QLYS) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +5.35% and +1.30%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Why CrowdStrike (CRWD) Shares Are Getting Obliterated Today
summary: Shares of cybersecurity platform provider CrowdStrike (NASDAQ:CRWD) fell 7.2% in the afternoon session after the "AI replacement" narrative reached a fever pitch following the release of new models from Anthropic and OpenAI.

headline: Palo Alto Networks Ties Chronosphere Deal And Partner Shift To Valuation
summary: Palo Alto Networks completed its acquisition of observability platform Chronosphere, aiming to tie together monitoring data with security insights for AI-driven threat detection and response. The company also introduced the next generation of its NextWave Partner Program, targeting deeper integration across network, cloud, and security operations center environments. Both moves are intended to support customers that want unified visibility and more automated remediation as AI reshapes IT and...

headline: Cloud Security Posture Management Company Analysis 2025: Aqua Security, CrowdStrike, Fortinet, Microsoft, Orca, Palo Alto Networks, Qualys, SentinelOne, Sysdig, Tenable, Trend Micro, Upwind, Wiz
summary: The rapid global adoption of cloud technologies presents key opportunities in developing real-time cloud-native security solutions. Organizations need efficient, cost-effective tools for automating misconfiguration prevention and integrating cloud security into existing workflows, driving demand for comprehensive CSPM and CNAPP platforms.Dublin, Feb. 05, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- The "Frost Radar: Cloud Security Posture Management, 2025" report has been added to ResearchAndMarkets.com's offering.

headline: Palo Alto Networks NextWave Program Accelerates Partner Profitability and AI-Driven Security Outcomes
summary: Palo Alto Networks (NASDAQ: PANW), the global cybersecurity leader, today announced the next generation of its NextWave Partner Program, fundamentally redefining partner profitability for the AI era. As the industry moves toward AI-driven security, NextWave moves beyond transactional volume to reward partners who deliver platform-centric security outcomes.
